Reviews.Title: “Nice hotel, good location”

Reviews.Title: “The motto of this hotel should be, "Customer go away; you annoy me; get out of my face /and hotel/".”

Reviews.Content: staff hotel exceedingly rude whenever concern defensive double bed provided twins hours dead night double miraculously appeared stated hadnt double stated reservation receipt day housekeeping 3pm response till 4pm thats policy stay till hour front desk staff hotel nasty nasty nasty advice dont yourself staying awful hotel 115 night adage pay apply unless consider paying abuse
